message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase this valuable product. I believe it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll see its value. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1100000.
I'm very interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget. I'm willing to pay $900000 for it. Can we meet in the middle?

I understand you're looking to be mindful of your budget, but I'm not willing to go as low as $900000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get closer to the value I know this product holds. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1050000.
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but $1050000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $950000 for the product. Can we meet at this price?

I understand you're still trying to find a sweet spot, but I'm not willing to go as low as $950000. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to the value I know this product holds. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1025000.
I appreciate your concession, but I'm still a bit hesitant. I'm willing to pay $1000000 for the product. Can we meet at this price?

I understand you're getting closer to the value you see in the product, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1000000. I'm willing to meet you at the halfway point between $1000000 and $1200000, which is $1100000. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1100000.
I understand you're trying to meet me in the middle, but I'm still not willing to pay $1100000. I'm willing to pay $1000000 for the product. Can we meet at this price?
